LanguageData.BuildGun_BoltActionRifle.label: 制造 李-恩菲尔德 步枪
LanguageData.BuildGun_BoltActionRifle.description: Builds an ancient bolt-action rifle. Good range, good power and low rate of fire.\nCaliber: .303 British
LanguageData.BuildMosinBoltRifle.label: 制造 莫辛-纳甘M91 步枪
LanguageData.BuildMosinBoltRifle.description: Builds a Mosin-Nagant M91, an ancient bolt-action rifle. Good range, dood power and low rate of fire.\nCaliber: 7.62x54mm R
LanguageData.BuildCXfour.label: 制造 伯莱塔Cx4“风暴”卡宾枪
LanguageData.BuildCXfour.description: Builds the Beretta CX4, a highly reliable compact carbine. Below average damage, average fire rate, above average range and fires in two round burst.\nCaliber: 9x19mm Para
LanguageData.BuildPCnine.label: 制造 鲁格PC-9 步枪
LanguageData.BuildPCnine.description: Builds the Ruger PC-9, a carbine sidearm with pistol-calibre. Average damage, above average fire rate and average range.\nCaliber: .40 Rimfire
LanguageData.BuildUSC.label: 制造 HK USC 步枪
LanguageData.BuildUSC.description: Builds the HK USC, a stable semi-automatic pistol-calibre carbine with low kickback and an unusual stock design. Average damage, above average fire rate and range that fires three round bursts.\nCaliber: .45 ACP
LanguageData.BuildAKS74U.label: 制造 AKS-74U 突击步枪
LanguageData.BuildAKS74U.description: Builds the AKS-74U short assault rifle. Average damage and rate of fire, low range but poor accurracy. \nCaliber: 5.45x39mm R
LanguageData.BuildM4A1Gun.label: 制造 M4A1 卡宾枪
LanguageData.BuildM4A1Gun.description: Builds the M4A1 Carbine, a shorter and lighter variant of the M16A2 assault rifle. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and good accurracy.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
